meanings.definition: A person who signs a document or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The signers of the contract were happy with the terms.
meanings.sent2: The signers of the petition gathered to make their voices heard.
meanings.sent3: The signers of the will were relieved to have everything settled.
meanings.sent4: The signers of the treaty brought peace to the land.
meanings.sent5: The signers of the agreement shook hands in agreement.

meanings.definition: Those who communicate using sign language.
meanings.sent1: The signers at the event used gestures to convey their messages.
meanings.sent2: The signers in the deaf community are skilled at expressing themselves.
meanings.sent3: The signers in the class had a silent conversation using their hands.
meanings.sent4: The signers on stage captivated the audience with their movements.
meanings.sent5: The signers in the group shared stories through their signs.
